project: Healthcare platform - Optum - Benefit Central web application
description: Developed scalable web applications and optimized backend services.
responsibilities: Spearheaded the development of high-performance, accessible UI components for healthcare benefit central platform using Material UI and Optum's Skyline Design System.
Built and collaborated with other teams to develop Microfrontend's to integrate with Benefit central platform.
Optimized frontend performance by implementing lazy loading, code splitting, and server-side rendering, reducing the initial load time by 30%.
Integrated with backend services to fetch and display data using RESTful APIs and GraphQL, cutting API call overhead by 40%.

project: Manufacturing SaaS platform - Manufacton web & mobile
description: Worked on cloud-based solutions and improved system performance.
responsibilities: Led the frontend redesign of the Manufacton Web App using Vue 3, TypeScript, and Storybook, enhancing UI/UX and performance
Developed and maintained scalable backend services with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Docker, and AWS, ensuring efficient data processing.
Designed and integrated RESTful APIs with Swagger documentation and Postman collections, streamlining API development and collaboration
Managed AWS-based server infrastructure, optimized deployments, and built live hybrid iOS apps using React Native and =code for cross-platform functionality.

project: Construction Management SaaS Platform - Apolla web application
description: Developed and maintained cloud-based applications and optimized system performance.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained scalable backend services using Node.js, Express, Docker, and AWS, ensuring high performance and reliability.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs with third-party integrations, maintaining comprehensive documentation using Postman and ApiDocs.
Built and optimized test-driven microservices in a multi-tenant, Docker-based architecture, enhancing system maintainability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an Agile/Scrum environment to gather and refine requirements, aligning development with business objectives.
